content: On-demand dog walking service with a GPS tracking system

An on-demand dog walking service that connects busy dog owners with reliable dog walkers who are available to walk their furry friend anytime, anywhere. Dog owners can easily book a dog walker through an app or website, and track their dog's walk through a GPS system.
Book dog walkers on-demand using an app or website. GPS tracking system to monitor dog walks. Easy payment and scheduling system. Service available Dog walkers are vetted and trained.
Rover, Wag!, Fetch!, Care.com, Swifto
The GPS tracking system offers transparency and accountability, giving dog owners peace of mind that their dog is being walked as scheduled.
Personalized dog walking plans

A personalized dog walking plan created for the dog and the owner's unique needs. The dog walker will meet with the owner and dog to discuss the dog's needs and preferences, and create a customized exercise routine that fits into their schedule.
Personalized dog walking plans. Experienced and trained dog walkers. Flexible scheduling options. Easy payment system. Communication with owners.
Fetch!, Rover, Swifto, Tailster, Dog Walker
The personalized approach ensures that each dog receives the exercise and attention it needs, while accommodating the owner's schedule.
Dog walking group classes

A group dog walking class that is designed to provide an exercise routine for dogs and owners. The class meets at a dog-friendly park and is led by an experienced dog trainer who will guide the owners and dogs through a fun and engaging workout.
Group dog walking classes. Led by experienced dog trainers. Socialization opportunities for dogs. Healthy exercise routine for dogs and owners. Affordable pricing.
PetSmart, Petco, Off Leash K9 Training, Zoom Room, Karma Dog Training
The group class offers a socialization opportunity for dogs and owners, while also providing a healthy exercise routine for both.
Dog walking treadmill rental service

A dog walking treadmill rental service that allows owners to provide their dog with indoor exercise when they can't make it to the park. The company will deliver and set up the treadmill in the owner's home and provide a training session for the dog to get used to the equipment.
Treadmill rental for indoor exercise. Delivery and setup of equipment. Training session included for dogs. Easy payment system. Flexible rental options.
Fit Fur Life, Canine Treadmill, K9 Cruiser, Hayes Treadmill, GoPet
The treadmill rental service allows owners to provide their dog with exercise at any time, without leaving the house, and encourages healthy indoor exercise habits.
pain_point_title: limited time to walk their dog
pain_point_description: working professionals with busy schedules often struggle to find time to walk their dogs as frequently as they should
